  • Constructor Details

    • MoleculeFixationInfo

      public MoleculeFixationInfo(String aMoleculeName, boolean anIsFixedX, boolean anIsFixedY, boolean anIsFixedZ, int aMaxTimeStep, int aFirstIndex, int aLastIndex)
      Constructor (No checks are performed)
      Parameters:
      aMoleculeName - Name of molecule
      anIsFixedX - True: x-component of all particles of molecule is fixed, false: Otherwise
      anIsFixedY - True: y-component of all particles of molecule is fixed, false: Otherwise
      anIsFixedZ - True: z-component of all particles of molecule is fixed, false: Otherwise
      aMaxTimeStep - Maximum time step for application
      aFirstIndex - First index in particle arrays for molecule
      aLastIndex - Last index in particle arrays for molecule
